meanings.sent1: The crested bird looked majestic perched on the tree.
meanings.sent2: The rooster with a crested head strutted proudly around the farm.
meanings.sent3: The crested cat costume for Halloween was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Her crested hairstyle stood out in the crowd like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The crested mountain peak was visible from miles away.

meanings.definition: Having a crest of feathers on the head
meanings.sent1: The crested parrot chirped happily in its cage.
meanings.sent2: The crested peacock displayed its vibrant feathers.
meanings.sent3: The crested chicken looked like it was wearing a fancy hat.
meanings.sent4: Her crested hairdo was as colorful as a tropical bird.
meanings.sent5: The crested cardinal stood out among the other birds.

meanings.definition: Having a crest of feathers on the head, as a bird
meanings.sent1: The crested robin sang a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: The crested eagle soared high in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The crested penguin waddled awkwardly on the ice.
meanings.sent4: Her crested hairstyle was as striking as a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The crested flamingo's pink feathers were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Having a crest of feathers on the head, as a bird or other animal
meanings.sent1: The crested peacock danced gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The crested iguana basked in the sun on the rock.
meanings.sent3: The crested dinosaur toy was a favorite among the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her crested hairstyle was as unique as a rare bird.
meanings.sent5: The crested dragon's scales shimmered in the moonlight.
